paper.title: An Ontology-based Hierarchical Clustering Approach for Decision Support in Mass Customization Environments
paper.abstract: The shift from mass production to mass customization has led many manufacturers to diversify their product portfolio by making their products highly configurable. This diversification often results in higher production costs. Through standardization this costs can be reduced. Clustering of sold product configurations can help identify configurations that can be standardized without dissatisfying the customers. Many clustering algorithms are developed for different applications, but often the results are not self-describing. In this paper an ontology-based hierarchical clustering approach with a linkage method particularly designed to return reasonable clusters is proposed. An experimental evaluation with historic sales data supplied by a truck manufacturer shows that the approach is able to find meaningful insights in mass customization contexts. The introduced linkage method shows advantages to the single linkage method in semantic clustering.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究一种基于本体的层次聚类方法，用于大规模定制环境中的决策支持，其应用场景是制造商的销售数据分析，与金融领域无关。
